description:
Would you like to Have a Glowing Looking Skin Drenched in Non Greasy Moisture?Then Your Skin is About to Have an Experience of Delicacy"Get Your skin Indulged and Rejuvenated With Lagrange Shea Body Butter that:- Revitalizes, Softens and Maintains Skin Moisture.- Enriched With vitamins E that is Essential For Good skin Balance.- Helps Restoring Skin Elasticity and Regenerating Skin Cells.- Soothes Some skin Conditions like Eczema and Prevent/Removes Stretch Marks.- Packed in a Beautiful High Quality Package.Benefits of This Shea Butter Include:Vitamin EProvides the skin with necessary moisture as well as antioxidants for intense healing. Helps  repairing free radical damage, treats wrinkles by supporting new skin cell growth and speeding up cells regeneration, it also helps to restore skin elasticity.GlycerinFights off bacterial infections and makes the skin more supple and works on restoring its elasticity. Draws water into the outer layer of the skin in support of treating skin condition such as eczema and irritation.BeeswaxBeeswax is known to lock in moisture, foster cells and protect skin from damaging environmental factors. Beeswax's anti-inflammatory, antibacterial, anti-allergenic and germicidal antioxidant properties make it a very effective wound-healing agent.All the ingredients of this product were carefully crafted to insure every use will add a beautiful life experience to the users. Leaving the skin smelling beautiful, glowing and perfectly moisturized. A regular use of this product can help the skin to look and feel Healthy, naturally balanced and rejuvenated. Above all, this is our intention and that what really matter to us. We put love into it and we hope it will catch you.
Go and add it into your cart and give your skin a pampering Spoiling Experience.
title: Shea Butter - Smooth Luxurious - Intense Long Lasting Moisturization in a Beautiful Scent - Ultra Rich Whipped Shea Body Butter Easily Absorbed Into Your Skin - Heals Extremely Dry, Rough or Damaged Skin - Leaving Your Skin Feeling and Looking Soft and Rejuvenated. This Is an FDA Certified Product.
